name: Skeleton Knight
languages: understand its master’s language in life but cannot speak

actions.name: Melee Weapon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: varies, damage is determined by weapon. Battleaxe or longsword: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands. Greatsword: 9 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage.
